attributes.action: keep all paedophiles in secure confined community away from ours and our kids
attributes.additional_details: Keep all predatory paedophiles in their own enclosed secure community for them so we know we are safe and our children as there is no cure and rehabilitation doesn't work re-offending rates what stop and kids would have safe environment to grow up in. Do not release them into our society across from schools and playgrounds if they must be released, they could have their own none internet accessed secured community paid for with money wasted trying to cure them its a sexual preference not a disease.
